This link to an article was posted on my paranormal writers loop ( 
PNwriters) and it is so true, and comes across like Saitou Hajime's  
philosophy on all things authorly (if he had been a writer, of  course) 
that I thought some of you might be interested in seeing it.  So here's 
the link click away and become enlightened

http://www.scalzi.com/whatever/archives/000701.html
